item.title: How to convert .zoom files on Windows
item.description: Preface It seems like Zoom does no longer allow you to convert the files just by clicking on them. This guide explains how to convert .zoom files on Windows. Here you can find the guides for Linux and macOS. I’m assuming that you’ve installed the Zoom client using the standard way. Step 1 First you need to navigate to the Zoom application directory. It will be in C:\Users\<Your user name>\AppData\Roaming\Zoom\bin, as a shortcut you can click into the path input of your Explorer and type in %appdata% and press enter.
